acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a third draft of typescript of Interpretations: A Suite of Poemsfor "Modest Petrovich Mussorgsky's Pictures at an Exhibitionby Robert Wooster Stallman.
